Affliction.name: Ants
Affliction.description: The patient is showing signs of great pain and torture.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have were tortured to death.

Affliction.name: Blood clot
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of blood clotting.
Your lungs are perforated by pulmonary agents.
